Mendokusai

Tartarus

Choose Happiness

30 Sep 2018

There are an infinite number of things to be sad about today. There will be an infinite number of things to be sad about on every other day of my life too. If I ever hope to be happy, my only hope is to ignore all those things, and choose to be happy. Today.
